Text: The Civil Aviation Authority (CAA) has mobilised more than 40 aircraft from airlines including British Airways and easyJet to bring 150,000 Thomas Cook customers home to the UK.
Cause: bring 150,000 Thomas Cook customers home to the UK.
Effect: The Civil Aviation Authority (CAA) has mobilised more than 40 aircraft from airlines including British Airways and easyJet
Sentence: <e2>The Civil Aviation Authority (CAA) has mobilised more than 40 aircraft from airlines including British Airways and easyJet</e2> to <e1>bring 150,000 Thomas Cook customers home to the UK.</e1>
